law.catch_line: Board Of Trustees; Expenses In Excess Of Budget
law.text: [Text of section effective until July 1 preceding the opening of the Essex North Shore agricultural and technical school. Repealed by 2004, 463, Sec. 1. See 2004, 463, Sec. 18 as amended by 2010, 130, Sec. 7.] The board of trustees shall not incur expenses in any fiscal year in excess of the budget amount approved by the commissioner of education unless the trustees determine that adequate funds are available for such expenses.
